item.description:
WebInno is one of the biggest and most important web tech events in Boston. It's free, open to the public and impeccably run, so it draws a huge crowd of Boston's web tech community.

IF YOU RSVP YES, BE SURE TO REGISTER FOR WEBINNO: https://www.eventbrit...

The event itself starts at 6:30 and is held at the Royal Sonesta in Cambridge. Let's meet up at 5:30-ish for some eats at the Cambridgeside Galleria food court across the street and then head over together.

I'll be stationed towards the back of the food court (near the windows overlooking the water) and will be wearing an EditMe baseball hat.

If you haven't been to a WebInno yet, here's what to expect. Doors open at 6:30 and a big crowd gathers outside the Sonesta ballroom. They have a bar and name tags are available. At 7pm everyone heads into the ballroom setup with a big screen, podium and seating for the "Main Dish" presentations. Several startups demo their products on the big screen to the audience and then take questions. Afterward, a number of "Side Dishes" are set up in an adjacent room - these are additional startups with a table setup talking about their product or service.

Cambridgeside Galleria Food Court
http://www.cambridges...

WebInno
http://www.webinnovat...
item.name: Webmaster Outing: WebInno 24
